item.description:
This is an amazing spot to see wildlife! Last time I was here I saw ducks, Canadian Geese, Red Winged Blackbirds, Chickadees, Robins, Orioles, Great Blue Herons, Otters and fish.

We will meet at the refuge parking lot in Concord. From Concord Center take Route 62 east for about 1 - 2 miles. Take a left at Monsen Road and follow it to the parking lot. This location is not accessible by T. However, I can pick some people up at the Concord MBTA Commuter Rail stop.
item.name: Great Meadows National Wildlife Refuge
